content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I, as the landlord, was seeking the highest possible price for my property, while Mr. Wang, as a student, was looking for a price that fit his budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question does not apply. The parties did not agree on a price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question does not apply. The evaluation of likeability is not relevant to this conversation from my perspective.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The question does not apply. I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
